titleStmt.title: Announcement of Fifteenth Annual Meeting and Conference, February 3-5, 1926, in New York City.
titleStmt.author: National Urban League

publicationStmt.p: This document forms part of the project "Editing the Eartha M.M. White Archive" at the University of North Florida.

msIdentifier.repository: University of North Florida, Thomas G. Carpenter Library Special Collections and Archives

msContents.summary: Announcement and invitation to attend Fifteenth Annual Meeting and Conference, February 3-5, 1926, in New York City.

objectDesc.p: An invitation to The National Urban League 2 pages

editorialDecl.p: This file was transcribed and encoded according to the editorial criteria of the project "Editing the Eartha M.M. White Archive." Using the various options encoded within <choice> elements, this file enables the viewing of a diplomatic transcription and a regularized reading text.

body.p:
THE NATIONAL
URBAN LEAGUE
announces its
Fifteenth Annual Meeting
and Conference
to be held in
NEW YORK CITY
FEBRUARY 3 to 5, 1926

All members of the League,
Social workers and other inter-
ested friends are invited.

Subjects for discussion include
"Industry", "Health and Hous-
ing" and "Inter-Racial Co-oper-
ation."

Special Feature : Report on
the experiences of Negroes with
Trade Unions in the United
States and a discussion of training
for industrial opportunities.

Address all communications of inquiry
concerning speakers and topics for dis-
cussion to

Eugene Kinckle Jones, Executive Secretary
National Urban League 127 East 23rd Street New York City

James H. Huburt, Executive Secretary
The New York Urban League
202 West 136th Street
New York City
